column4: quick question guys in bash, what is the best way to append text to a root owned file?
best is to use sudo tee -a file > /dev/null
thank you i will try it out
also, guys at #bash are really amazing for bash questions... true pros :)
change your HOST key from Left-CTRL to another key
or try using the the other ctrl
I have mine set up as right-alt... rarely interferes with anything
any ideas? i changed screen capture to right alt even then ctrl + shift + up is not working
screen capture? you mean the host key?
i got it on my ultrabook its set to function key + shift + page up
